title: Web-based Visualisation Tool of Horizon 2020
descriptions: Build a web-based visualisation tool of Horizon 2020 at the Swedish Innovation Agency;
Work mainly focuses on UI/UX design and front-end development.

title: Interaction Design of Seizure Alert Watch & APP
descriptions: Design a Assistive Technology to support the epileptic patients and help them live as normal people;
Work mainly focuses on ideation, user research, UI/UX of low-fi and high-fi prototype of the applications.

title: Yocktail - Great Platform for Cocktail Lovers
descriptions: Yocktail is a platform offered to cocktail lovers, allowing users to search, collect, create and share cocktails;
Work as a full-stack designer and developer, from UI/UX design, to front-end & back-end programming.

title: Vinyo: Buy the wine you love on mobile
descriptions: Vinyo APP is a critically-acclaimed, free app that helps you search, find and buy the wine you want;
Work focuses on the client-end development of this iOS application.
